Guys who downloading this crack for the first time, let me explain: Once in a while there is a update of Modern Warfare 2. People who play MW2 through Zero Gear are playing with a patch which isnt the latest. If MW2 is updated, you cant play on that patch anymore, so there must be made a new crack for a patch. This was the crack, but it seems it just worked for an hour or so.

ok there is new crack from paravoz but it still not work very well. if you join host that have original game it will kick you after 2 min, if you join a cracked host you can play. there is very very low probability to join a cracked version. the good news is that you can run your personal public host, where  you can invite your friends (the invite work for someone for other one not work).  if you want to be able to invite, you have to buy a game from steam (example a cheap game with online 3?) that give you the friend list so you be able to invite your friends. if you want I can upload the new crack but I tried it 2 times and it kicked me out after 2 minutes, because I joined a host that have original game. my advise is to put a tag before your name (example: [ZeroGear] YOURUSERNAME) that give you the ability to recognize if the host have cracked or original game and exit if it's original.
If you want I can upload the new crack otherwise wait for a new workaround
